name: HolyCow Design
tag_list: graphic-design, freelance, brand, branding, desktop-publishing, digital-scrapbooking, business-card, letterhead, stationary, logo
overview:
HolyCow Design gets your story out in style.

HolyCow! Who is your design gal? That’d be me, Laura Brooker.

I began HolyCow Design to offer freelance graphic design specializing in identity projects (logos and business stationary) and coffee table books, in other words, helping you get your special photographic memories out of the drawer and onto your table.

My passion has always been the story. Where you’ve been, where you’re going. My goal is to really hear you and coach you through the creative process to help bring your vision to life. Together we can create beautiful, thoughtful design that works, just the way you imagined it.
